statements.query: MATCH (n:GSuiteGroup) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GSuite Groups that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GSuiteUser)-[r:MEMBER_GSUITE_GROUP]->(:GSuiteGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GSuite User-to-Group relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GSuiteGroup)-[r:MEMBER_GSUITE_GROUP]->(:GSuiteGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GSuite Group-to-Group relationships that are out of date.
